title: The Challenge
description: Jessica is tired. Tired of parents who are too strict, of a boyfriend who pays her too little attention, and at the same time trying to decide what she is going to do with her life after graduation. When challenged run a youth service at her church, she jumps at the chance, but has she taken on more than she can handle?When Ryan Spencer steps up to help, they form an instant friendship and everything starts to fall in place. Jessica has never felt God move so strongly in her life. When a serious accident threatens to take it all away, can Jessica hold on to her faith and the happiness she finally found?
author: EmmaLee Bertagnole
